snippet: Taxi drivers in Hungary’s capital demonstrated over a fixed tariff for traditional taxi firms that is higher than Uber’s.
abstract: Cab drivers in Budapest, Hungary, block roads to protest Uber; move follows new fixed tariff that favors Uber drivers over traditional taxi companies.
lead_paragraph: Taxi drivers in Hungary’s capital demonstrated over a fixed tariff for traditional taxi firms that is higher than Uber’s.

headline.main: Taxi Tariff Prompts Drivers in Budapest to Protest Uber
headline.print_headline: Taxi Tariff Prompts Drivers in Budapest to Protest Uber
